text: Nabiyow sinam gablâ mari gablal magide sugee? axcuk koo essereenik usun gablal sugeenih gide Yallay Qaranwaa kee baaxol Qellitti ittaamih ixxiga-le yaaxige keenik ixxic, Nabiyow ku-Rabbih mablaa kee maabbah dudda Qajjibsit kaak qellittam inki innah matanak, ginok qaranwaa kee baaxô bagul eneyyi ittam Yallak sa cateynay ken cata malon, Yalli isi meklaa kee isi madqat agleyta maliiy num mayasgallaay isih faxam aba
